movie.title: Smashing the 0-Line
movie.description_intro: Two reporters of divergent morals investigate a drug ring, delving deeper into the underworld in the process.
movie.description_full: Two reporters of divergent morals investigate a drug ring, delving deeper into the underworld in the process.

movies.title: Santa Claus: The Movie
movies.summary: This is the story of a master toymaker who discovers a magical kingdom of elves in the North Pole and becomes Santa Claus. But when Santa's eager-to-please elf Patch leaves the North Pole for the big streets of New York City, he becomes mixed up with a dastardly toy tycoon's plans to take over Christmas. And so begins Santa's adventure - to rescue his faithful elf and to save Christmas for all the children of the world!
movies.description_full: This is the story of a master toymaker who discovers a magical kingdom of elves in the North Pole and becomes Santa Claus. And so begins Santa's adventure - to rescue his faithful elf and to save Christmas for all the children of the world!

movies.title: Safari 5000
movies.summary: An international group of racers compete at a Safari Rally.
movies.description_full: An international group of racers compete at a Safari Rally.
movies.synopsis: An international group of racers compete at a Safari Rally.

movies.title: Knowing
movies.summary: In the fall of 1959, for a time capsule, students draw pictures of life as they imagine it will be in 50 years. Lucinda, an odd child who hears voices, swiftly writes a long string of numbers. In 2009, the capsule is opened; student Caleb Koestler gets Lucinda's "drawing" and his father John, an astrophysicist and grieving widower, takes a look. He discovers dates of disasters over the past 50 years with the number who died. Three dates remain, all coming soon. He investigates, learns of Lucinda, and looks for her family. He fears for his son, who's started to hear voices and who is visited by a silent stranger who shows him a vision of fire and destruction. What's going on?

movies.title: Greatland
movies.summary: Trapped in a world of perpetual fun and inter-species love ruled by a universal Mother, a teenage boy crosses the forbidden frontier to save his childhood sweetheart as an absurd election and a deadly virus lead to chaos and violence.
movies.description_full: Trapped in a world of perpetual fun and inter-species love ruled by a universal Mother, a teenage boy crosses the forbidden frontier to save his childhood sweetheart as an absurd election and a deadly virus lead to chaos and violence.
